definitions.title: interj.
definitions.body: hush! keep silence (prob. onomatop.) Ju Jdg 3:19 and he said, I have a secret errand unto thee, O king, [[וַיּאׁמֶר êָהס]] and he said, Keep silence! Am 6:10 [[וְאָמַר êָהס]] (while burying men in a pestilence), Am 8:3 (ellipt.) in every place: [[הִשְׁלִיח הָֽס]] they cast them (the corpses) forth, (saying) Hysh ! sq. ´[[מִפְּנֵי י]] ([[מִפָּנׇיו]]) Hb Hab 2:20, Zep 1:7, Zec 2:17. Inflected, as though a verb, imv. pl. [[êַהסּוּ]] Ne 8:11 (Ges compares Arab. halum=a [= [[הֲלֽם]]] hither! inflected as an imv., e.g. halum=iy, halum=w0: W:AG i. § 368). Hence as denom.
